channel.title: scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: MPPGCL Vacancy 2025 Apply Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Generating Company Limited (MPPGCL) has released a recruitment notification for 346 vacancies across various posts including Assistant Engineer, Junior Engineer, Plant Assistant, Office Assistant, Stenographer, Fireman, Security Guard, and more. Candidates can apply online through the MPOnline portal from 23rd July 2025 to 21st August 2025. The selection process will be based on Computer Based Test (CBT), followed by Physical Test (for selected posts like Security Guard and Fireman) and Document Verification. Category-wise reservation is applicable only for the domicile candidates of Madhya Pradesh. Candidates from other states will be treated under the Unreserved (UR) category.

item.title: MPESB Paramedical Post-wise Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: MP Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has announced the Paramedical Recruitment 2025 for a total of 464 posts. The recruitment includes vacancies for Physiotherapist, Counselor, Pharmacist Grade-II, and Ophthalmic Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 28 July 2025 to 11 August 2025 through the official portal esb.mp.gov.in. The selection will be based on an online examination scheduled to begin from 27 September 2025. Candidates are advised to check the post-wise qualifications, age limit, and other details before applying.

item.title: MP Anganwadi Recruitment 2025 – Provisional Merit List
item.description: MP आंगनवाड़ी भर्ती 2025 के अंतर्गत महिला एवं बाल विकास विभाग, मध्यप्रदेश सरकार द्वारा आंगनवाड़ी कार्यकर्ता और सहायिका के पदों पर भर्ती की जा रही है। इस भर्ती के लिए केवल उसी वार्ड या ग्राम पंचायत की महिलाएं पात्र होंगी जहाँ पद रिक्त है। ग्राम क्षेत्र में नियुक्ति संबंधित ग्राम पंचायत की महिला से तथा नगरीय क्षेत्र में संबंधित वार्ड की महिला से की जाएगी। अन्य किसी ग्राम या वार्ड की महिला आवेदन के लिए पात्र नहीं मानी जाएगी। शैक्षणिक योग्यता के रूप में अभ्यर्थी का हायर सेकंडरी (12वीं पास) होना अनिवार्य है। यह भर्ती प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन माध्यम से आयोजित की जाएगी और आवेदन केवल MPOnline पोर्टल के माध्यम से ही स्वीकार किए जाएंगे।

item.title: MPESB Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025 Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has released the notification for the Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025. A total of 10,150 Varg 3 Primary Teacher posts will be recruited under the School Education Department. Eligible candidates who have qualified the MP Primary TET 2020 or 2024 can apply online. Applicants must check the detailed eligibility, age limit, and other conditions in the official notification before applying. Candidates from outside MP can also apply but will not get any domicile reservation or relaxation benefits.

item.title: Damoh District Data Entry Operator Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Collector Office, Damoh (Madhya Pradesh) has released a notification for the recruitment of Office Assistant cum Data Entry Operator (Contractual). There is 1 vacancy, reserved for the Scheduled Caste (SC) category. Candidates must have passed 12th class, hold a valid CPCT score card, and possess typing proficiency in both Hindi and English. A minimum of 3 years of experience in MS Office and database software is required, along with skills in data feeding and document scanning. The applicant must be a domicile of Madhya Pradesh. The application process starts from 15 July 2025 and the last date to apply online via the MPOnline portal is 31 July 2025.

item.title: MPPSC Food Safety Officer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Food Safety Officer (FSO) with a total of 67 vacancies. The application process will be conducted online, and the job location is Madhya Pradesh. Candidates from all over India are eligible to apply, but those from other states will be treated as General (UR) category and will not receive any reservation or fee relaxation. Applicants must hold a Bachelor’s, Master’s, or Ph.D. degree in Food Technology, Agriculture, Biotechnology, Chemistry, Veterinary Science, Medicine, or a related field, or possess an equivalent qualification recognized by the Central Government. The age limit is 21 to 40 years, with age relaxation applicable as per rules for reserved categories. For complete details and to apply, visit the official website mppsc.mp.gov.in.

item.title: MPTRANSCO Various Post Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Transmission Company Limited (MPPTCL) has released a recruitment notification for 633 regular posts under the 2025–26 session. This recruitment is open only to the permanent residents of Madhya Pradesh. The available positions include Assistant Engineer (Transmission), Law Officer, Junior Engineer (Transmission and Civil), Line Attendant, and Substation Attendant. The application process is completely online, and the last date to apply is 4th August 2025. The selection will be based on a written examination followed by document verification. Educational qualifications, reservation rules, and other eligibility criteria will follow the Madhya Pradesh government norms. For detailed information and online application, candidates can visit the official website: www.mptransco.in.

item.title: MPESB Parvekshak Recruitment Test 2024 (Result)
item.description: MPESB ESB Released Parvekshak Sanchalnalay Mahila evam Bal vikash M.P. Bhopal Recruitment Test - 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this MP ESB Parvekshak Post Recruitment 2025 Examination can Apply Online

item.title: MPPSC Vehicle Transport Sub Inspector Recruitment 2025-Apply Online
item.description: MPPSC has released the Vehicle Transport Sub Inspector Recruitment 2025 notification. The recruitment aims to fill multiple SI posts under the Transport Department. Interested candidates can apply online through the official MPPSC website. The notification includes details about eligibility, age limit, application dates, and selection process.

item.title: MPESB Group 1 Sub Group 3 Online Form 2025 (Admit Card)
item.description:
MP ESB Group-1 (Sub Group -3) Combined Recruitment Test - 2024 Various Post Recruitment 2025

Madhya Pradesh Employee Selection Board (MPESB)

Short Details of Notification MPPEB Group 1 Sub Group 3 Exam 2025

Important Dates

  • Application Begin: 25/02/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 11/03/2025
  • Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 11/03/2025
  • Correction Last Date: 16/03/2025
  • Exam Date Start: 15/05/2025
  • Admit Card Available: Before Exam

Application Fee

  • General / Other State: 560/-
  • SC / ST / OBC: 310/-
  • Portal Charge: 60/- (Include)

  • Pay the Exam Fee Through Cash at KIOSK Or Pay Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking Fee Mode Only

Eligibility

  • Age Limit as on 01/01/2024

  • Minimum Age: 18 Years.
  • Maximum Age: 40 Years.

Age relaxation as per rules of MPPEB Group 1 Sub Group 3 Exam 2025 .

item.title: MPHC Group D (Class IV) Jobs 2025 – Apply Now
item.description: MP High Court (MPHC) Class IV Group D Recruitment 2025 के तहत Peon, Sweeper, Driver आदि पदों के लिए आवेदन की प्रक्रिया 13 मई 2025 से शुरू होगी। उम्मीदवार 28 मई 2025 तक आवेदन कर सकते हैं। इस भर्ती में आवेदन शुल्क, आयु सीमा, चयन प्रक्रिया और वेतनमान समेत सभी महत्वपूर्ण जानकारी योज़ना पोर्टल पर उपलब्ध है।
